title: Companion Approval Guide
content: le. Reveal his identity to the monster hunter. Failing the persuasion check asking him to explain his dream. Killing Mayrina's zombie husband after bringing him back with the Hag's wand. Promise Nettie to take Wyvern Poison if you feel symptoms of the tadpole (after intimidating/persuading/deceiving her). At camp, when talking about your preferred method of death say you'd rather have one of the others do it, or that you don't have to choose. At camp, when the Owlbear cub comes with a dead bird
